# Capability Catalog Backlog

Prioritized list of features, improvements, and ideas.

## High Priority

### Schema & Validation

- [ ] Add JSON Schema version for broader tool compatibility
- [ ] Validate dependency references exist
- [ ] Add schema versioning support
- [ ] Create migration guide for schema changes

### Examples

- [ ] Add CI/CD domain examples
- [ ] Add data engineering domain examples
- [ ] Create multi-capability workflow example
- [ ] Document failure mode discovery process

### Documentation

- [ ] Add troubleshooting guide
- [ ] Create video walkthrough
- [ ] Add FAQ section
- [ ] Improve code comments in scripts

## Medium Priority

### Tooling

- [ ] Create `cap` CLI tool
  - [ ] `cap init` - create new capability
  - [ ] `cap validate` - validate capability files
  - [ ] `cap preflight` - run pre-flight check
  - [ ] `cap list` - list all capabilities
  - [ ] `cap deps` - show dependency graph
- [ ] Add pre-commit hook for validation
- [ ] Create VS Code extension for schema autocomplete

### Integration

- [ ] Python package for programmatic access
- [ ] TypeScript/Node.js package
- [ ] Example agent integration patterns
- [ ] Webhook support for capability validation

### Testing

- [ ] Add unit tests for validation scripts
- [ ] Add integration tests for pre-flight checks
- [ ] Create test fixtures for edge cases

## Low Priority

### Ecosystem

- [ ] Capability registry/index
- [ ] Community contribution guidelines
- [ ] Capability search functionality
- [ ] Usage analytics dashboard

### Advanced Features

- [ ] Capability versioning and compatibility
- [ ] Automatic capability generation from OpenAPI specs
- [ ] Capability diff tool for version comparison
- [ ] Natural language capability search

## Ideas (Unrefined)

- Capability templates for common patterns
- Integration with secrets managers for access validation
- Slack/Discord bot for capability queries
- Browser extension for viewing capabilities
- Capability audit logging
